messages.title: YES TO EUROPE. NO TO CLIMATE CHAOS

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Take meaningful action on greenhouse gas emissions and lobby government to work on an international level.
Promote and protect local businesses and enterprises, and support the creation of new ones.
Improve broadband provision within West Norfolk.
Improve transport links within the region and ensure every village is connected to its market town by a reliable and regular bus service.

mentions.candidate: Pallavi became involved in politics in a non-partisan way with the campaign against the incinerator in King’s Lynn.

issues.environment: She was a founder of the environmental group, Downham and Villages in Transition, which aimed to raise awareness of the climate and environmental crisis facing us.

community.content: She lives in the beautiful rural village of Shouldham with her family.

leaflet.personalStatement: She has spent most of her working life in West Norfolk, and lives in the beautiful rural village of Shouldham with her family.

politicalExperience.role: Founder member of Downham and Villages in Transition
politicalExperience.achievements: Raised awareness of the climate and environmental crisis.

examples: If elected I will take meaningful action on greenhouse gas emissions, and lobby government to work on an international level to do the same.
Promote local businesses and enterprises, help protect our existing woodlands and create new ones, and improve broadband provision within West Norfolk.
Lobby government to work on an international level to take meaningful action on greenhouse gas emissions.
Improve transport links within the region and ensure every village is connected to its market town by a reliable and regular bus service.
Take meaningful action on greenhouse gas emissions and lobby government to work on an international level to do the same.

personalStories.story: She has spent most of her working life in West Norfolk, and lives in the beautiful rural village of Shouldham with her family.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: She has spent most of her working life in West Norfolk.
nonPolicyAttributes.employment: Pallavi is a GP in Downham Market.
nonPolicyAttributes.family: She lives in the beautiful rural village of Shouldham with her family.

examples: She has spent most of her working life in West Norfolk, and lives in the beautiful rural village of Shouldham with her family.
